Simulator
Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
  Simulator.Simulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Simulates time and all the systems talking to each other

Author:
Nikolas Parshook
